targets.rawSql:
with
balance_4h_ts as (
  select *
  from (
          select chain, vault_id,
              time_bucket_gapfill('4h', datetime) as datetime,
              --sum(balance_diff) as balance_diff,
              locf(avg(token_balance)) as balance
          from beefy_report.vault_investor_balance_diff_4h_snaps_3d_ts
          -- make sure we select the previous snapshot to fill the graph
          where datetime between ('${__from:date}'::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '3d') and '${__to:date}'::TIMESTAMPTZ
              and investor_address = evm_address_to_bytea('$investor_address')
          group by 1,2,3
  ) as t
  where balance is not null
)
select 
    b.datetime as time,
    sum(
        (
          (b.balance::NUMERIC * vpt.avg_ppfs::NUMERIC) / POW(10, 18 + vpt.want_decimals)::NUMERIC
        )
        * vpt.avg_want_usd_value
    ) as value
from balance_4h_ts b
left join beefy_derived.vault_ppfs_and_price_4h_ts vpt 
    on b.chain = vpt.chain 
    and b.vault_id = vpt.vault_id
    and b.datetime = vpt.datetime
    and $__timeFilter(vpt.datetime)
where vpt.vault_id is not null
group by 1
order by 1

with
balance_4h_ts as (
  select *
  from (
          select chain, vault_id,
              time_bucket_gapfill('4h', datetime) as datetime,
              locf(avg(token_balance)) as balance
          from beefy_report.vault_investor_balance_diff_4h_snaps_3d_ts
          -- make sure we select the previous snapshot to fill the graph
          where datetime between ('${__from:date}'::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '3d') and '${__to:date}'::TIMESTAMPTZ
            and investor_address = evm_address_to_bytea('$investor_address')
          group by 1,2,3
  ) as t
  where balance is not null
)
select 
    b.datetime as time, 
    vpt.vault_id,
    sum(
        (
          (b.balance::NUMERIC * vpt.avg_ppfs::NUMERIC) / POW(10, 18 + vpt.want_decimals)::NUMERIC
        )
        * vpt.avg_want_usd_value
    ) as value
from balance_4h_ts b
left join beefy_derived.vault_ppfs_and_price_4h_ts vpt 
    on b.chain = vpt.chain 
    and b.vault_id = vpt.vault_id
    and b.datetime = vpt.datetime
    and $__timeFilter(vpt.datetime)
where vpt.vault_id is not null
group by 1,2
order by 1,2
